QuestData.Title: Cluck, Cluck, Boom
QuestData.Description:
The endemic poultrids of Zereth Mortis have been influenced in an unseemly way by all these invaders.
Use this device on the ones that have malfunctioned. Otherwise, they will do too much damage to the land.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Kinematic Micro-Life Recalibrator to "recalibrate" Malfunctioned Poultrids in the Great Veldt.
QuestData.RewardText: Those poultrid do make quite a mess. Thank you for your assistance.
